app.name: bpsvvs
app.summary: This is a Blue Pearl Software Visual Verification Suite (VVS) integration app that helps you load your Xilinx design into Blue Pearl's Visual Verification Suite RTL debugging environment.

proc.name: generate_bps_project
proc.summary: Generate a Blue Pearl Visual Verification project file

proc.name: launch_bps
proc.summary: Launch Blue Pearl Visual Verification Suite on the current design

proc.name: update_vivado_into_bps
proc.summary: Import the current implementation data into Blue Pearl Visual Verification Suite
